code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Korpa=()=>{const user=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));const[cartItems,setCartItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{if(!user)return;fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/cart/".concat(user.email)).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setCartItems(data)).catch(()=>setCartItems([]));},[user]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Korpa korisnika: ",user===null||user===void 0?void 0:user.email]}),cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Korpa je prazna."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cartItems.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.name," - ",item.price," KM"]},idx))})]});};export default Korpa;
